articles.description: Chelsea hold talks to appoint Leicester City manager Enzo Maresca, Emery signs long-term Villa contract, plus all the latest football news and gossip.
articles.title: Football latest as Chelsea hold talks with Maresca & Emery signs Villa deal

articles.description: Ineos is "confident" of finding a solution to allow its clubs Manchester United and French club Nice to compete in next season's Europa League.
articles.title: Man Utd: Ineos confident of solution over Nice in Europa League

articles.description: F1 correspondent Andrew Benson answers your questions following the Monaco GP - including Oscar Piastri’s pace, Red Bull's form and potential rule changes.
articles.title: F1 Q&A:  Andrew Benson answers your questions

articles.description: Carlo Ancelotti guided Real Madrid to the Champions League final with the help of a secret weapon, his son Davide.
articles.title: Carlo Ancelotti's secret weapon - his son, Davide

articles.description: Elena Rybakina overcomes a slow start to defeat Belgium's Greet Minnen in straight sets and reach the French Open second round.
articles.title: French Open 2024 results: Elena Rybakina reaches second round at Roland Garros

articles.description: The Boston Celtics book their place in the NBA Finals by beating the Indiana Pacers 4-0 in the Eastern Conference semi-finals.
articles.title: NBA play-offs: Celtics beat Pacers to reach NBA Finals

articles.description: Cristiano Ronaldo sets a new record for goals scored in a Saudi Pro League season after taking his tally to 35.
articles.title: Cristiano Ronaldo: Al-Nassr forward sets new Saudi Pro League scoring record

articles.description: Rafael Nadal says he is likely to skip Wimbledon in order to protect his body and achieve his goal of playing at this year's Olympics.
articles.title: French Open 2024: Rafael Nadal prioritising Paris Olympics over Wimbledon

articles.description: German football expert Raphael Honigstein discusses why Vincent Kompany has been chosen to take over at Bayern Munich.
articles.title: Bayern Munich: Raphael Honigstein on Vincent Kompany

articles.description: Kieran McKenna is expected to sign a new deal to remain as Ipswich Town manager after guiding the club to the Premier League.
articles.title: Kieran McKenna expected to stay as Ipswich Town manager
